snippet: Preservationists are working to salvage badly deteriorating buildings in Yangon’s historic downtown.
abstract: Many colonial-era buildings in Yangon, Myanmar, are in disrepair, prompting a preservation campaign; Thant Myint-U, head of Yangon Heritage Trust, insists conservation of the buildings would make Yangon a star attraction of Southeast Asia.
lead_paragraph: Preservationists are working to salvage badly deteriorating buildings in Yangon’s historic downtown.

headline.main: In Myanmar, Racing to Save a Colonial Past in Decay
headline.print_headline: Racing to Save a Colonial Past in Decay
